Description:
CP909 - ASC - Direct payment to vendor
F1/F5 says ""Must view each pending payable""."
Solution: Press the Page Up or Page Down Keys.

Title: Invalid Username/Password on Tire-HQ
Description:
CP911 Getting ""Invalid username or password was specified"" while signing onto Tire-HQ because password is invalid, forgotten, or deleted due to none use.

(for a username and password for Tire-HQ - none ever issued - use CP1080)
(for associate enrollment - use CP1027)
(for remove from suspense - use CP1027)
Users are deleted :
at 30 days when a newly defined user doesn't login (within that first 30 day period)
at 6 months of no login for a regular user (dealer/wtc/associates/etc)
at 12 months of no login for a User Admin (dealer/wtc)

Updated 8/5/2013 MEC
Solution:
"1. Confirm that the user is typing in the correct username and password in lower case. (verify in User Reg dbase)
2.  Advise the user that there is a Reset Password feature on the Login Page. (assist them through that process)
If the user gets a message stating that they do not have an email address or invalid username, ask them if they are the User Administrator ? (or associate)
No- Have them get with the User Administrator to assist/add user.  If they do not know who the Administrator is ... access User Reg & advise them. (If more than one User Admin, give them the UA that shares the same Head Office as them) If this is a Car Dealership, there is no User Admin, just one username.  (Channel 09) - [see ""Steps for User Admins"" listed below for assistance]

Yes - Open up User Reg to confirm UA & email address is correct/listed. If no email address avail, or  if they have an new email address to give you, ...  (non Associates) for security purposes, call the location back using the phone number listed in WAD.  Once verified, update User Reg with this correct email address, then have user attempt Reset password again.  If this is an Associate, update their user record with their email address.  If they do not exist (they have been deleted), get First, Last name, and email address, Update in Work History, then transfer to Level 2 HD. [see steps below - ""Level2 HD""]

Steps for User Admins:
The User Administrator at the location must reset the password for the user.  They must go into Home page>User Administration> ""View/Update User"" >""Change password, email address....."". Type in the new password ... then click on  ""Apply Change"" link.  Once the password has been changed ,the user can log in.

Level2 HD-
Deleted User Admins:
Open XPLOR Users Dbase.  Does this UA exist?
   Yes - Type in any changes needed, click on button to setup user.  Modify User to get Financials/restrict etc.
   No - Call location back, ask to speak to owner/mgr to confirm setting up this new User Admin.  Type in any changes needed, click on button to setup user.  Modify User to get            Financials/restrict etc."

Standard Users & User Administrators:
Deleted after 30 days if the account is new and they have not logged in ever.

Standard Users: (Dealer/WTC/Associates/etc)
Deleted if they have not logged in in the past 180 days (6 months.)

User Administrators: (Dealer/WTC)
Deleted if they have not logged in in the past 365 days (12 months.)

Title: Akron rec'd pmt on locally billed invoice
Description: CP914 Nat'l account or government account issued payment to Akron credit department.  The credit department issued "K" document to the dealer's statement, transferring payment to the store.  The journal books a Dr to code 25000, Accts Pay Gdyr and Cr to 50800, Misc Sls/Off Expense.
Solution: Store to issue A/R Jt Cr customer's 10100 account and Dr code 50800.  Then, process zero cash receipt, offsetting the credit line created via the Jt with the original invoice on the A/R record.

Title: COO WARRANTY DEDUCTIBLE
Description: CP915 COO - Warranty Deductible Code for extended service work warranty....what is it?
Solution: Per WAD65 Screen, the code is 046218.

Title: AUDIX Hang-ups
Description: CP917 Customer reaches Voice Mail but hangs up without leaving message.
Solution:
"File EA report and close under
terr. # 0000."

Title: Canadian postal codes
Description: CP920 Canadian Postal Code...how do you enter it?

Title: PARTS ROM-PENDING PARTS
Description: CP921 Enter Only One Field Above error message: what does it mean?
Solution: The fields at the bottom of the pending parts receipts screen are search fields...can list by Vendor#, Created from, or Shipment #. If you enter more than one of these fields, you will get this message. Delete all but one of the fields to search.

Title: Changing Goodyear Code field
Description: CP922 How to change the "Goodyear Code" field for an existing 390xxx code ?
Solution:
"Codes cannot be  modified once setup as a dealer product.  If they must change the Goodyear Code:
1. Establish another dealer code using the Goodyear Code required
2. Wait overnight for maint to run.
3. Bring the tires in under the new dealer code.
4. Remove the tires from the old dealer code."

Title: Store payment rec'd in Akron
Description: CP923 Locally billed customer paid Goodyear corporate in Akron instead of store.
Solution: The Goodyear credit department will issue a "K" document journal ticket which credits the store's 50800, Misc Sls/Off Expense and debits code 25000, Accts Pay Gdyr.  The store issues an A/R jt. against the local receivables, crediting 10100 and debiting 50800 to correct.

Title: Returned check to Dealer
Description: CP924 How to process customer returned check?
Solution:
"There are a couple of ways to handle this issue:
1)  Establish an A/R account if customer doesn't already have one and issue A/R jt, crediting cash code 10000 and debiting customer's account under code 10100 for check and bank fee.

2) Establish sub account code under 10700, Notes Payable, such as 10701 and call it ""Returned Checks.""  Issue Std Jt creditig Cash acct 10000 and debit 10701 for the check  and bank fee.   If dealer wishes to charge add'l store fee, take credit to Other Misc Income code 44800.

To receive payment from customer:     1) process cash receipt for A/R account or 2) process negative Paid Out, placing cash into the drawer to be included in the nightly deposit."

Title: EOD REPRINT-AR END OF MONTH
Description: CP929  EOD Reprint AR on third page at the End of the Month....cannot print it because of equipment failure, etc. Need AR information on the page...how do I retrieve it?
Solution: Third page will not reprint after a month end. Will have to go to AR Reports and print AR Location Totals. This will give them the same information.

Title: Combining orders (Multi Locations)
Description: CP934 User has entered pending order for a nonsig, then signed on as another nosig and enters an order. User goes to Tire Dolly, and Tire Dolly show order entered plus all pending orders (for that Username) for other nonsigs within their common owner.(search: userid, UserID, USERID, password, PASSWORD)
Solution: There is only one Tire Dolly per Username. It is reccommened that the User submits each order before going to the next nonsig. Orders are combined at the end of each day, so the Dealer will not loose any special pricing.  To change to a different nonsig in their common ownership ... click on "Change Customer#" link.  If user has many locations to order, suggest they use the order upload feature.

Title: GBMS Remittance Process
Description: CP936 Needs assistance processing Goodyear remittance in GBMS.
Solution:
"Walked customer through selecting
C & P Due invoices for payment, selecting Future Due Credits, selecting specific future due invoices or selecting by due date, deducting pending items, etc. as required by dealer."

Title: Remittance questions
Description: CP942 How do I submit, select invoices etc.
Solution:
1) Go to Remittance Worksheet
2) Select F2 (Pay All C&P Due)
3) Select F1 (Approve Remit) - Remittance will print

Dealer will need to process a Quick Check and code it to account 25000 to show the payment.

Title: Assign Product Code to Sub Acct
Description: CP966 Need to assign product code to expanded sub account.
Solution: In DASMN select Chart of Accounts, then option 4 Management of Sales/Cost-of-Sales accounts, and enter the 3 digit prime account (3xx or 4xx.)  Press F3 (Assign Product Code) and enter the Sub Account of the related product code to be associated.  Enter the product code on the PC/LN field.  Msg will generate that file has been updated and the  effective date will generate as the following month i.e. 9/98 if processed in August.

Title: Freight Claim Credit
Description: CP971 Received credit for freight claim under Freight expense (acct 56900.)  What needs to be done to resolve?
Solution:
Although the tires were never received at the store, they were billed on the "K" document and are still in the Akron stock ledger.
To correct
1) issue inventory correction "book only" taking the tires out of inventory. This will make an accounting entry crediting inventory and debiting (charging) cost of sales code 42800, Mdse Over/short.
2) Issue a Std Jt crediting 42800 and debiting 56900 to keep both accounting buckets in proper alignment.

Title: NA  F2 Validate key to exit NA 'DOT' requirement
Description:
CP978 National Accounts F2 Validate key
How do I exit National Accounts requirements/service/DOT Registration screens without completing the entries?"
Solution:
Press F2 Validate.
Then press any key necessary.

Title: What code is REF Document booked against
Description: CP984 Need to know what DAS accounting code particular invoice/document is booked against.
Solution: Search DAS accounting code detail in TPX to find document in question.

Title: NA - deductible service on Delivery Receipt
Description:
CP922 National Accounts  - deductible service on a Delivery Receipt (DR)
The customer has paid me a deductible amount required by this national account.
How do I enter it into my drawer?
Solution:
The deductible will be a minus entry on the DR using code 046218 (per the NA Manual).
The location will create a POS invoice for this amount, using the same service code as a positve entry to affect the drawer correctly for EOD cash calculations

Title: Pending Billing
Description: CP996 What is status of pending Delivery Receipts?
Solution: Contact WOC Customer Relations @ (330) 796-6640 or 6641.
